name: AKSHITA
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
Maana ki humse galti hui, par ishq mein khata bhi saza ban jaati hai,
Tere bina har khushi adhoori, har baat bevajah ban jaati hai.

Naraazgi teri seh nahi sakta, tera saath meri jaan hai,
Tere bina yeh duniya sooni, har lamha ek imtihan hai.

Aa ja meri jaan, nafrat ko mohabbat mein badal dete hain,
Chhoti-chhoti galtiyon ko hanskar sambhal lete hain.

Main tujhse beinteha pyaar karta hoon, yeh dil tera aashiyana hai,
Chalo phir se muskurate hain, hamara pyaar sabse suhana hai.❤️
